author: VinInn
body:
Sorting of TempTrajectory in CkfTrajectoryBuilder::limitedCandidates takes almost 1% of HLT time.
Reducing it's size to two pointers this timing is reduced by half.
Took the opportunity to reduce the size of Trajectory as well.
and to cleanup  general CkfTrajectoryBuilder code.

HLT throughput improves of a solid 0.5% at least,

Purely technical.  Some regression may appear in case of "candidates" with identical score.
title: Speedup handling of (Temp)Trajectory by reducing their size
